content: half-knit mitts designed by shelley carr size woman s size 7 ½ to 8 materials yarn sport weight 150 yds model is in sport weight alpaca needles #3 double pointed needles cable needle 3 stitch markers 2 same color 1 contrast gauge 7 sts per inch in stockinette st pattern stitch rib pattern multiple of 5 *k4 p1* repeat from * to * abbreviations c4b slip 2 sts to cable needle hold to back of work knit 2 sts from left needle knit the 2 sts from cable needle m1r insert lh needle tip from back to front under bar between stitches lift bar to form new loop and knit through the front of it m1l insert lh needle tip from front to back under bar between stitches lift bar to form new loop and knit through the back of it cuff co 50 sts place contrast colored marker on needle join in the round being careful not to twist sts round 1 through round 13 *k4 p1* repeat from * to * around work cable round as follows *k4 p1 c4b p1* repeat from * to * around work round 1 five times work cable round repeat these last 6 rounds once more work round 1 one more time thumb gusset gusset stitches are knit in stockinette stitch round 1 k1 place marker m1r k2 m1l place marker k1 p1 then continue around in established rib pattern round 2 k1 slip marker knit to next marker slip marker k1 p1 then continue in established rib pattern to end of round round 3 repeat gusset round 2 round 4 increase round k1 slip marker m1l knit to next marker m1r slip marker continue in established rib pattern to end of round repeat rounds 2 3 and 4 until there are 16 sts between gusset markers work round 2 twice more last gusset round k1 place the 16 gusset sts onto a piece of yarn removing gusset markers cast on 2 sts to close opening k1 p1 continue in established rib pattern to end of round 50sts hand work rounds in established rib pattern until mitt measures 1½ inches or desired length above the gusset where you cast on 2 sts purl 1 round knit 1 round bind off in purl stitch thumb place the 16 gusset stitches onto 3 double pointed needles join yarn and knit these 16 stitches pick up 3 sts to close the gap between thumb and hand knit 5 rounds or desired thumb length purl 1 round knit 1 round bind off in purl stitch weave in ends make the second mitt and enjoy whippletree yarn shop 7 central street woodstock vt 05091 802-457-1325 www whippletreeyarnshop com ©2008/ revised 2016
